scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Groups_GroupBanner_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($isGroupTheme = false) #if ($core_v2_page.ThemeTypeId == $core_v2_group.ThemeTypeId) #set ($isGroupTheme = true) #end $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('style.vm') #set ($parentNavigationId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('parentNavigation')) #set ($applicationNavigationId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('applicationNavigation')) #set ($userId = $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id) #set ($group = $core_v2_group.Current) #set ($groupType = $core_v2_group.Current.GroupType) #set ($isRegistered = $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id)) #set ($membershipType = "None") #set ($groupUser = $core_v2_groupUserMember.Get($group.Id, "%{UserId = $userId}")) #set ($membershipType = $groupUser.MembershipType) #set ($canLeaveGroup = ($groupUser.IsDirectMember && !$groupUser.IsRoleMember) && ($membershipType != "Owner" || $core_v2_groupUserMember.List($group.Id, "%{MembershipType = 'Owner', PageSize = 1}").TotalCount > 1)) #set ($canJoinGroup = $core_v2_nodePermission.Get("groups", $group.Id, $core_v2_groupPermissions.JoinGroup).IsAllowed) #set ($canJoinGroupByRequest = $core_v2_nodePermission.Get("groups", $group.Id, $core_v2_groupPermissions.JoinGroupByRequest).IsAllowed) #set ($application = false) #set ($application = $core_v2_application.Current) #set ($includeParent = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('includeParent', true)) #set ($includeNewLogin = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('includeNewLogin', true)) #set ($inheritNarrow = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('inheritNarrow', true)) #set ($inheritNarrowAppTitle = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('inheritNarrowAppTitle', true)) #set ($rootGroup = $core_v2_group.Root) ## get current non container/app content #set ($content = false) #set ($content = $core_v2_content.Current) #set ($contentName = false) #if ($content && ($application && $content.ContentId == $application.ApplicationId) || ($group && $content.ContentId == $group.ContainerId) || $content.Errors.Count > 0) #set ($content = false) #set ($contentName = false) #elseif ($content) #set ($contentName = $content.HtmlName('Web')) #end #set ($withAlert = false) #if (!$isRegistered && ($groupType == "PublicOpen" || $groupType == "PublicClosed")) #set ($withAlert = true) #elseif ($groupType != "Joinless" && $membershipType == "None" && ($canJoinGroup || $canJoinGroupByRequest)) #set ($withAlert = true) #end #set ($isHome = false) #if ($core_v2_groupUrls.Current == 'Group') #set($isHome = true) #end #set ($applications = $core_v2_customNavigation.Deserialize($group.Id, $core_v2_widget.GetCustomValue('navigation', ''))) #set ($name = $group.Name) #set ($description = "") #if ($application) #set ($description = $application.HtmlName('')) #elseif (!$isHome) #foreach($app in $applications) #if ($app.IsSelected) #set ($description = $!app.Label) #end #end #end #set ($forceNarrow = false) #if (!$isGroupTheme && $inheritNarrow) #set ($forceNarrow = true) #end #set ($currentGroupPath = false) #if ($includeParent && $group.Id != $rootGroup.Id) #set ($currentGroupPath = $core_v2_group.CurrentGroupPath) #end
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($core_v2_group.Current.AvatarUrl, 68, 68, "%{ alt = $group.Name, ResizeMethod='ZoomAndCrop' }")
#if ($includeParent && $group.Id != $rootGroup.Id) #set ($pathIndex = $currentGroupPath.Count) #set ($parentGroupName = false) #set ($parentGroup = false) #set ($depth = 0) #if ($pathIndex > 2) #foreach ($pathGroup in $currentGroupPath) #beforeall
    #each #set ($depth = $depth + 1) #if ($group.Id != $pathGroup.Id) #set ($parentGroup = $pathGroup) #end
  • $pathGroup.Name
    • #afterall
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('more')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('cancel')
#end #elseif ($pathIndex == 2) #foreach ($pathGroup in $currentGroupPath) #if (!$parentGroup) #set ($parentGroup = $pathGroup) #end #end
  • $parentGroup.Name
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('more')
#end #end
#if ($isHome)

$name

#else
$name
#end #if ($application) #if (!$content && $core_v2_urls.FullPath($core_v2_page.Url) == $core_v2_urls.FullPath($application.Url))

$description

#else $description #end #if ($content) $contentName #end #elseif (!$isHome) #foreach($app in $applications) #if ($app.IsSelected) #if (!$content && $core_v2_urls.FullPath($core_v2_page.Url) == $core_v2_urls.FullPath($app.Url))

$description

#else $description #end #if ($content) $contentName #end #end #end #end #foreach($app in $applications) #beforeall
    #each ## don't render 'home' links #if ($group.Url != $core_v2_page.AbsoluteUrl($app.Url))
  • $!app.Label
    • #end #afterall
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('more')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('cancel')
#nodata
    #end
    ## New Post Links #set($links = false) #set($links = $core_v2_group.ListNewPostLinks($group.Id)) #if ($links.Count == 1) #foreach($link in $links)
    • $core_v2_language.GetResource('new_post')
    #end #elseif ($links.Count > 1) #foreach($link in $links) #beforeall
      #each
    • $link.Label
      • #afterall
    • $core_v2_language.GetResource('new_post')
    • $core_v2_language.GetResource('cancel')
    #end #elseif (!$isRegistered && $includeNewLogin) #set($returnToCurrentUrl = true) #set($loginLink = $core_v2_urls.LogIn("%{ReturnToCurrentUrl = $returnToCurrentUrl}"))
    • $core_v2_language.GetResource('new_post')
    #end #if (!$isRegistered && ($groupType == "PublicOpen" || $groupType == "PublicClosed"))
    $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('Hubs_JoinGroup'), $group.Name)
    ## Render extra vertical padding to allow for membership message #registerEndOfPageHtml()
    #end #elseif ($groupType != "Joinless" && $membershipType == "None" && ($canJoinGroup || $canJoinGroupByRequest))
    $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('Hubs_JoinGroup'), $group.Name)
    ## Render extra vertical padding to allow for membership message #registerEndOfPageHtml()
    #end #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.groupBanner') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #end
    #if (!$forceNarrow) #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #end

language.resource: Render a bottom border beneath the banner. When the bottom shadow is enabled, only renders when not scrolled.
When selected, the cover photo is blurred. This is useful for legibility of overlaid text when using a complex image.
When provided, a cover photo is rendered as the banner's background. Using a cover photo increases the height of the banner on its homepage.
Customize your group's banner with a cover photo or color palette.
When enabled, parent groups can be navigated to from the current group
Add, edit, delete, and reorder navigation items for this group.
Displays a banner of common group information and links.
There was an error joining or leaving the group.
Edit this group and add a description
{0} requires membership for participation - click to join
Render the narrow view on inherited themable applications that provide their own banner, such as blogs.
Always render the application title in narrow view on inherited themable applications that provide their own banner, such as blogs.
When enabled, renders a 'New' button to non-logged-in users which redirects to login.
Select a color palette for your group's banner, or create a custom one.
Render a shadow beneath the banner. When the bottom border is enabled, only renders when scrolled.
When selected, the cover photo is shadowed to increase legibility of text on a light photo.
Groups are areas of interest within your community where people can share and collaborate together. Some groups are public while others are private.
启用后，可从当前社区导航到父级社区
为此社区添加、编辑、删除和重新排序导航项目。
显示通用社区信息和链接的横幅。
加入或退出社区时出现错误。
编辑此社区并添加描述
此社区需要成员资格才能参与 - 单击以加入
组是社区中可供用户分享和协作的相关区域。某些社区是公开社区，而某些社区是私有社区。
當啟用時，可從目前社群導覽至父社群
新增、編輯、刪除和重新排序這個社群的導覽項目。
顯示一般社群資訊和連結的橫幅。
加入或離開社群時發生錯誤。
編%E8%BC%AF這個社群並新增描述
此社群需要會員資格才能登入 - 按一下以加入
群組是社群內具有共同利益的區域，人們可以在此進行分享及協同合作。某些社群為公開性質，其他則為私人社群。

scriptedContentFragment.additionalCssScript: #set ($designMode = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('designMode', 'color')) #if ($designMode == 'photo') #set ($coverPhotoUrl = false) #set ($coverPhotoUrl = $core_v2_widget.GetUrlValue('coverPhotoUrl', '')) #if ($coverPhotoUrl && $coverPhotoUrl.Length > 0) with-cover-photo #end #set ($blurCoverPhoto = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('blurCoverPhoto', true)) #if ($blurCoverPhoto) with-blur #end #set ($shadowCoverPhoto = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('shadowCoverPhoto', false)) #if ($shadowCoverPhoto) with-shadow #end #end
